newsitem.title: USA: Techniclone says to hire new CEO.
newsitem.headline: Techniclone says to hire new CEO.

text.p: Techniclone Corp said Tuesday it plans to hire several new executives, including a chief executive officer, in preparation for clinical development and licensing of its products and technologies.
The company said its current president, chief executive and chairman Lon Stone will continue in his current role until a new CEO is hired.
He will remain as chairman thereafter, the company said.
The hiring of a new CEO will allow Stone to concentrate on long-term strategic planning and the expansion of international operations for the company.
